flawed_nl_solution:
At first Jeff paid, $300/month x 12 months = $<<300*12=3600>>3600/year
He paid $3600/year x 3 years = $10800 the firsts 3 years.
The final 2 years he paid $350/month x 12 months = $<<350*12=2400>>2400/year
He paid $2400/year x 2 years = $<<2400*2=4800>>4800 the last 2 years.
He paid the owner $10800 + $4800 = $<<10800+4800=15600>>15600 in total.
#### 15600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4200, not 2400. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
